1.question: 1.What'sthe name of the city where I was born? (Does not include its parent name)
2.What'sthe full name of the hospital where I was born?
3.What was the time of my birth? (for example, at 13:31)
4.What's my dad's full name?
5.What's my mother's full name?
6.What are my parents' full names? (Separated by commas)
7.What'sthe full name of my first child?
8.What'sthe full name of the most impressive teacher in elementary school days?
9.What'sthe full name of the most impressive teacher in junior high school?
10.What'sthe full name of the most impressive teacher in high school?
11.What'sthe full name of the most impressive teacher in college?
12.What'sthe full name of the closest classmate in primary school?
13.What'sthe full name of the most closely related students in junior high school?
14.What'sthe full name of your closest classmate in high school?
15.What'sthe full name of the classmate who is closest to you in college?
16.What'sthe full name of the first classmate you know when you just entered junior high school?
17.What was the full name of the first classmate you met when you first entered high school?
18.What was the full name of the first classmate you met when you first entered the university?
19.What'sthe full name of the first teacher who taught me when I first entered primary school?
20.What'sthe full name of the first teacher who gave me a class when I first entered junior high school?
21.What was the full name of the first teacher who taught me when I first entered high school?
22.What was the full name of the first teacher who taught me when I first entered college?
